metadata.description: A curated marketplace of Claude Code plugins and skills for enhanced development workflows

plugins.name: devloop
plugins.description: Token-conscious feature development workflow with enhanced engineer agent (6 new skills, mode-specific workflows, complexity-aware selection), mandatory checkpoint enforcement, loop completion detection, context management, fresh start mechanism, spike-to-plan application, worklog sync automation, consolidated super-agents (18â†’9), XML-structured prompts, unified language patterns, strategic model selection (opus/sonnet/haiku), and comprehensive documentation (agents.md, testing.md)

plugins.name: security
plugins.description: Comprehensive security plugin providing OWASP ASVS 5.0-aligned audits via /security:audit command with 17 domain-specific auditor agents, plus live security guard hooks for real-time vulnerability detection during code changes
